```{r, echo=FALSE}
knitr::raw_html(
'
<div id="observablehq-chart-e0614ed4"></div>
<div id="observablehq-viewof-H-e0614ed4"></div>
<div id="observablehq-viewof-m-e0614ed4"></div>
<div id="observablehq-viewof-s-e0614ed4"></div>
<div id="observablehq-viewof-r-e0614ed4"></div>
<div id="observablehq-viewof-d-e0614ed4"></div>
<div id="observablehq-viewof-p-e0614ed4"></div>

<script type="module">
import {Runtime, Inspector} from "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@observablehq/runtime@4/dist/runtime.js";
import define from "https://api.observablehq.com/@andrew-primer-e/modskurt.js?v=3";
new Runtime().module(define, name => {
  if (name === "chart") return new Inspector(document.querySelector("#observablehq-chart-e0614ed4"));
  if (name === "viewof H") return new Inspector(document.querySelector("#observablehq-viewof-H-e0614ed4"));
  if (name === "viewof m") return new Inspector(document.querySelector("#observablehq-viewof-m-e0614ed4"));
  if (name === "viewof s") return new Inspector(document.querySelector("#observablehq-viewof-s-e0614ed4"));
  if (name === "viewof r") return new Inspector(document.querySelector("#observablehq-viewof-r-e0614ed4"));
  if (name === "viewof d") return new Inspector(document.querySelector("#observablehq-viewof-d-e0614ed4"));
  if (name === "viewof p") return new Inspector(document.querySelector("#observablehq-viewof-p-e0614ed4"));
  return ["chartUpdater","data","url","copyAction"].includes(name);
});
</script>
'
)
```
